articles.title: U.S. long-range fighter bombers to be forward-deployed
KCNA refutes Bush's bellicose remarks
articles.content:
U.S. long-range fighter bombers to be forward-deployed 
    Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is busy forward-deploying long-range fighter bombers to mount preemptive attacks on the DPRK, according to a news report.
 A spokesman for the U.S. Department of Defense on March 4 said that 24 fighter bombers are moving to Guam Island, according to its decision adopted on Feb. 28.    
 He publicly declared that an order was issued to forward-deploy more U.S. Forces in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Chosun Ilbo rejected

articles.content:
Chosun Ilbo rejected 
    Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Over 1,100 members of civil and social organizations of South Korea held a press conference on March 4 and declared a campaign for refusing to subscribe to Chosun Ilbo, according to South Korean MBC.
 They said that they would neither contribute to the paper nor have any interview with it until it repents of the past and stops carrying one-sided and distorted reports.
